text:
:wave: Fellow Developers!

We’re looking for a Backend Developer to join our team at Conversion Crew in Rotterdam, Netherlands. As a HubSpot Elite Partner, we tackle complex integration challenges and build sophisticated solutions for our clients.

If you enjoy building scalable solutions and want to work in the heart of Rotterdam’s tech scene, check out the full details here: <https://www.conversioncrew.com/en/vacature-backend-developer> Any questions can be send directly to *<mailto:caroline@conversioncrew.com|caroline@conversioncrew.com>*.

#hiring #backend #rotterdam #HubSpot
